description:
Fabio Pliger/Marc-André Lemburg - EuroPython 2017: Help us build the next edition!
[EuroPython 2016]
[21 July 2016]
[Bilbao, Euskadi, Spain]
(https://ep2016.europython.eu//conference/talks/europython-2017-help-us-build-the-next-edition)

We need help with organizing and running EuroPython 2017.

In this session, we will explain how the EuroPython workgroup model
works and where you could help.

-----

We need help with organizing and running EuroPython 2017

In this session, we will explain how the EuroPython workgroup model
works and where you could help.
title: EuroPython 2017: Help us build the next edition!
